item.title: ‘Queer Eye’ Star Jeremiah Brent Calls His Crate & Barrel Capsule a “Return to Heirloom”
item.description: The celebrity interior designer speaks with The Hollywood Reporter about his top decorating tips and exclusive new collection: “Every little detail’s been thought about.”
